alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Lipscomb; Ochiltree; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 5:23PM CDT until August 13 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR LIPSCOMB...NORTHEASTERN ROBERTS...NORTHWESTERN HEMPHILL AND EASTERN OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 522 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wolf Creek Park, or 14 miles southeast of Perryton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Perryton, Lipscomb, Wolf Creek Park, and Glazier. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
